Package MWC.GUI.SplitPanel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemPainter
    The ItemPainter interface defines a single item painter for non-edit painting.
    ItemPaintSite
    This interface is implemented where ItemPainters can be provided with more information about their host containers fonts, margins, colors, etc.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionMulticaster  
    BeanPanel
    Convenient Panel to use as a superclass for JavaBean views and controls - subdispatches focus, key and mouse events - manages action listeners - manages tab/focus awareness
    PaneConstraints  
    PaneLayout
    A Pane Layout Manager Maintains a binary tree of child components.
    SplitPanel  
    ThreeWayPanel
